DOC.brief_summary: To determine best parameter various lead cover back leg pain provide best pain relief
DOC.brief_title: Optimal Stimulation Programming Spinal Peripheral Neuromodulation
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective double-blinded trial patient already implant SCS determine program model best control back leg pain . Baseline visit 2 week implant . Baseline study data collect , program # 1 start . The visit @ week 4 collect NRS stimulator data , change program # 2 . The visit @ week 6 collect NRS stimulator data , start program # 3 . The visit @ week 8 collect NRS stimulator data . Subject chooses prefer program previous 3 us next 12 week . The visit @ week 20 collect NRS stimulator data final study visit information .
DOC.criteria: spinal cord stimulator implant within last 3 week NRS > 6 least 22 year old patient agree add increase pain medication study patient prior spinal cord stimulators pregnancy infusion pump history substance abuse dependency last 6 month
